tool.name: FloodDataDownloader

param.name: in_poly
param.dialogReference: The area of the restoration site being assessed. These areas will be compared to the NHDPlus Version 2.1 VPU to determine which catchments the sites intersect with.

param.name: VUB
param.dialogReference: NHDPlus Vector Processing Unit polygons define the NHDPlus regions where data is available. These are compared to the Restoration Site Polygons to determine the name and web location of needed NHDPlus files. If no dataset is specified, the tool will default to using the ~\NHDPlus_Downloads.gdb\BoundaryUnit file downloaded as part of the toolset. If no dataset is specified and the default dataset is not in the expected location this tool will fail to run.

param.name: outTable
param.dialogReference: The Download Folder is where the tool will download NHDPlus .7z data files. If left blank, the default is within the Spatial Analysis Toolset NHDPlusV21 folder ~\Rapid-Benefit-Indicators-Tools\py_Spatial\NHDPlusV21. Once downloaded, WinZip is used to unzip the files to the Download Folder. The Part - Flood Data Download Tool then merges the newly downloaded data into existing "Catchment" or "PlusFlow" files in a file geodatabase in the Download Folder (example default is ~\NHDPlusV21\NHDPlus_Downloads.gdb\Catchment). If a non-default Download Folder is specified, or the download is not merged with the expected files, the Part - Flood Risk Reduction Tool must be used for Flood Risk Reduction Benefit analysis instead of the Full Indicator Assessment tool.

tool.summary: The Flood Data Download Tool downloads the NHDPlus data needed to assess Flood Risk Reduction Benefits for the users' Restoration Site Polygons.
tool.usage: Download NHDPlus V2.1 catchments for use when calculating Flood Risk Reduction Benefits.

searchKeys.keyword: Flood Risk Reduction Benefits; NHD+; Data Download; RBI; Rapid Benefit Indicators; Ecosystem Services

dataIdInfo.idAbs: The Flood Data Download Tool downloads the NHDPlus data needed to assess Flood Risk Reduction Benefits for the users' Restoration Site Polygons.
